oai_dc:dc.dc:title: W.O. Smith Music School, Nashville, Tennessee, 2015 August 06
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An exterior view of the modern W.O. Smith/Nashville Community Music School building, located at 1125 8th Avenue South. Named in honor of Dr. W.O Smith (1917-1991), a professor of music at Tennessee State University, a member of the Nashville Symphony, and a noted jazz bassist. He had “a dream that by offering musical instruction to low-income families that these children could change their lives also. “ The W.O. Smith Music School, founded in 1984, is a nonprofit educational institution. Forms part of the Leanne Garland Photograph Collection. 1 digital photograph.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: W.O. Smith Music School (Nashville, Tenn.)
